projects.name: Deep Duo
projects.summary: Deep Duo is a method developed to yield meaningful uncertainty measure through disagreement betwee a larger neural network and a smaller neural network. It builds on the success of Deep Ensemble's strengths in providing calibrated uncertainty measure, take advantage from the growing capabilities and transferabilities of foundation models.
